thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Grand Canyon Education Again Seeks Nonprofit Status for Main University

author: Bowdeya Tweh
title: Grand Canyon Education Again Seeks Nonprofit Status for Main University
text:
For-profit education company Grand Canyon Education Inc. wants its main university to operate as a nonprofit school, less than two years after withdrawing a similar proposal to its accreditor. 
The Phoenix-based company said in a securities filing Friday that the Higher Learning Commission could vote on the application for Grand Canyon University to be classified as a nonprofit institution as early as February.
